    Learning Objectives

    By the end of the module, you will be able to:

    1. Identify, compare, and evaluate the different legal definitions of cultural property.
    2. Explain how these definitions impact cultural heritage law and its application.
    3. Recognize the components of a U.S. legal opinion.
    4. “Brief” a case.

    This Week’s To Do List

    • Read/Review all assigned Reading and Resources (note: please read the reading that is hyperlinked her in the lesson as it is shortened from the full)
    • View all Module 2 Lectures.
    • Complete the Module 2 Discussion Assignment.
    • Complete Journal Assignment #2.
    • Complete the Case Brief Assignment for Dugong v. Rumsfeld.
